game_description: Get your fist ready and defeat all the opponents in this VR rhythm action game! Immerse yourself in the fantasy world while throwing your fist to the beat. Release your stress and burn those calories through thrilling exercise! - Feature - [Original Songs] 38 specially crafted original songs. [Fantasy World Setting} Enjoy various breathtaking locations such as Mystical Forest, Colorful Seabed, and Sweet Candyland. [Game Mode Selection] Exercise easily with a "Boxing exercise" game mode! [Customability] Various gauntlets, enemy variations, and counterattack types are available! [Fitness effect] Exercise those upper body muscles by hitting enemies, avoiding obstacles, to your heart's content!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Chinese (Hong Kong), Chinese (Taiwan), Japanese, Korean, Russian
review_2: Especially for Cardio! The music is great, the scenery is great. That girl enemy in the first set of scenes is HOT!!! Why I had to take away a star? I HATE! HATE! and I mean HATE that Beat Saber bulls*** with the arrows! You have a jab, a cross, and uppercut, a hook and a hammerfist. That should be enough. Why do I have to throw an upper with a hammer simultaneously like I am splitting cubes in Beat Saber, which is a game I HATE! Other than that, great job!
review_3: I enjoy this game, it's a good workout. I like the environments and the different enemies you fight against. The music is also good. I compare this game to powerbeats, but with more gaming elements. Don't buy it if you don't want a fitness game, because you will move and sweat (and burn calories).
review_4: I got this game by mistake And I have to say best game I have on my headset look 4wad to more games from these developers
